title: Instructional Design to Enhance Havruta Learning Effects in Online Research Methodology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Operated in a non-face-to-face environment using digital devices, emphasizing evidence-based practice (EBP) competencies

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to define research questions and formulate hypotheses through Havruta discussions.
Learners identify over 80% of logical flaws in research designs through peer feedback processes.
Learners successfully present Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) application cases at least three times via PBL project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
